name: coin-case
effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.
short_effect: Holds coins for the Game Corner.

flavor_text.black-white: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.
